title: Same Flower - the speaker asks in lines 39-40

content.question: In lines 39-40, the speaker asks that

choices.label: anyone who criticizes the daisy find no peace
any bird who disturbs the daisy find no rest
no other flower challenge the beauty of the daisy
peace come to the daisy at last

content.answer: anyone who criticizes the daisy find no peace

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
